先使用{color=#FF0000}虎嘯沖天{/color}後，攻擊力增加{color=#00DB00}20%{/color}。

Items.mt: <[>Front<]><<\n>>After using Tiger Tsunami first, the attack power is increased by 20%. <<\n>>A solid four-strike attack with a high power.
